entry.title: Week in Ethereum News November 5, 2022
entry.summary: Eth News and Links Layer 1 Latest consensus layer call video. Notes from Ben Edgington & Christine Kim: Full & partial withdrawals to be processed in a single queue-less pipeline EIP4844 (proto-danksharding) to be developed on top of withdrawals Block value to be added to EngineAPI to allow comparing MEV-Boost vs locally built blocks MEV-Boost

entry.title: Week in Ethereum News October 29, 2022
entry.summary: Eth News and Links Layer 1 Latest core devs call video. Notes from Tim Beiko & Christine Kim: Shanghai upgrade scope to be finalized over the next month, could be split into two upgrades Shanghai will include withdrawals + EIP3651 (warm COINBASE), EIP3855 (PUSH0) & EIP3860 (limit & meter initcode) EIP4844 (proto-danksharding) & EOF being

entry.title: Week in Ethereum News October 22, 2022
entry.summary: Eth News and Links Layer 1 Visualization of Tornado Cash transactions & MEV-Boost relays; guide to analyzing MEV-Boost Ideas for next MEV-Boost features EIP4844 proto-danksharding progress update: targeting Shanghai upgrade, network bandwidth testing will determine target blob sizes History of account abstraction Research Vitalik updated paths to single slot finality Client releases Execution layer: Besu v22.7.7: memory & CPU performance improvements, reduces

entry.title: Week in Ethereum News October 15, 2022
entry.summary: Eth News and Links Execution layer Tim Beiko’s core devs update: Shanghai candidate EIPs, calls resume October 27 Besu v22.7.6: hotfix for v22.7.x failed block proposals Erigon v2.28.0: stability fixes & optimizations Shandong: pre-Shanghai upgrade testnet, Lodestar + Ethereum JS EL client Consensus layer Prysm developer Prysmatic Labs acquired by Offchain Labs (Arbitrum developer) Proposed
